2 Building Applications

2.3 Basic use of the MLWorks project system

This section introduces the use of the MLWorks compilation mechanism. It concentrates on how to use the GUI's project system, but equivalent programmatic access to the same features is available from the Shell.Project structure. See the MLWorks Reference Manual for more details.
